Home.WhatWeDoStatement: Located strategically in the bay area Pressta is a premiere engineering, design and precision manufacturing facility specializing in R&D, prototyping and assembly. No matter what part of the product design lifecycle Pressta can help bring your ideas to life!
Home.AboutUsStatement: Pressta currntly consists of 5 full time employees with a diverse set of skills ranging from graphic design to welding. Being small allows us to give our clients our full attention and keep them in the loop as their project comes together.
Home.WhyUsePresstaStatement: We all know that finding new vendors isn't easy. Whether you're looking to just test the waters or commit long-term our team will stand by our work and do whatever it takes to ensure your project is a success.
Home.IndustriesServed: Pressta has worked with companies in the aerospace, automotive, energy and research sectors.
Home.ClassificationsCertifications: Pressta is ITAR registered, a small business and have begun the process of becoming ISO-9001 / AS9100D certified. rOur

Services.Design: Our skilled designers are some of the best in the business. They can help any stage of the process from turning your concept into a reality or applying that final polish.
Services.Engineering: We will work with you to make sure your project is completed in-spec and on time. We have an extensive background designing products for commercial and consumer use
Services.Manufacturing: We are able to manufacture most metal and plastic parts with our in-house machine shop and finishing capabilities.

BottomCards.AdvancedMachinery: We use modern high speed machining strategies to turn jobs around quicker than the competition.
BottomCards.OnTimeEverytime: Pressta MFG’s combined 21 years of experience in metalworking and fabrication helps keep projects on track and allows us to foresee potential issues before they come up.
BottomCards.SkilledExperts: Our comprehensive background allows us to offer more services in-house saving you time and increasing your bottom line by preventing delays and expensive reworks.
BottomCards.FulfillingYourNeeds: Our engineering expertise allows us to turn your idea into a finished product and reproduce / repair pieces which are no longer in production.

Design.Statement: We can help bring your idea to life with our skilled design services.

EngineeringDesign.Statement: We can help bring your idea to life with our skilled design services. We specialize in design for manufacture / servicability and top of the line analysis.

Manufacturing.Statement: We specialize in CNC machined parts, gaskets and welded assemblies.

Machining.Statement: We can produce turned and milled parts using our in-house engine lathe and CNC

Other: Mirror Polishing (Non-Directional with a very high degree of image clarity, typically 0.05 µm Ra or less. Sample may be required)

Printing.Statement: We have both SLA and FDM 3D printers to quickly prototype plastic components.

LaserCutting.Statement: We frequently use laser cutting to produce gaskets and stencils/graphics.

Welding.Statement: We use TIG and MIG welding to join complex assemblies and perform repairs to existing components
